content.title: 🥳We Did it! 100% Funded! | Gifts For First 200 Supporters
content.creator:
Cenwatch
February 14, 2025
content.content:
Dear Friends,
Thank you for supporting our project. We have finally reached our goal! And we are glad we can make this idea a reality. This is a significant milestone for our product and team. 
🎁 Gifts For the First 200 Supporters. Don’t miss it!
To celebrate our dream coming true and express our gratitude, we will engrave a customized badge with your chosen name on the metal body of your exclusive backer’s watch. Let’s capture this moment together!
Best Regards,
CenWatch
